mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Read, George, 1765-1836
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Encloses by order of the Democratic-Republicans' meeting of the 3rd [Sept.], a printed copy of certain resolutions which were then unanimously adopted. Enclosure is: Democratic Republican citizens. New-Castle county, Delaware. Printed resolutions. Sept. 3, 1808.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1808 September 9, New Castle, Delaware to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
